TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSiteMapProvider extends System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class XmlSiteMapProvider Inherits StaticSiteMapProvider Implements IDisposable
public ref class XmlSiteMapProvider : System::Web::StaticSiteMapProvider, IDisposable

summary.span: 類別衍生自 類別，而且是 ASP.NET 的預設網站地圖提供者。

span.span: The class is derived from the class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET.

summary.span: 類別會從副檔名為 .sitemap 的 XML 檔案產生網站地圖樹狀結構。

span.span: The class generates site map trees from XML files with the file name extension .sitemap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別從遵循已知的結構描述的 XML 檔案載入網站地圖資料。The class loads site map data from an XML file that follows a known schema. 站台地圖資料會受限於``標記，並將包含巢狀``標記。The site map data is bounded by `` tags and consists of nested `` tags. 兩個條件約束所加諸和資料對應上的站台結構的類別：Two constraints are imposed by the and classes on the structure of the site map data: - 可以存在於只能有一個根節點。Only one root node can exist. - 如指定 Url、 Url 必須是唯一的提供者的範圍內的物件。For objects that specify URLs, the URLs must be unique within the scope of the provider. （不指定 Url 的節點，所有索引鍵必須是唯一的。）(For nodes that do not specify URLs, all keys must be unique.) 下列程式碼範例示範可以搭配使用的 XML 檔案。The following code example shows an example of an XML file that can be used with the . ``` ``` 是 ASP.NET 的預設提供者和 XML 資料讀取為 Web.sitemap 位於 ASP.NET 應用程式的目錄結構內的檔案。The is the default provider for ASP.NET and it reads XML data from a file named Web.sitemap that is located within the directory structure of the ASP.NET application. 根據預設，Web.sitemap 檔案位於應用程式根目錄。不過，如果想要變更名稱或檔案的位置，從中載入資料，您可以在 Web.config 檔案中覆寫預設組態。By default, the Web.sitemap file is located at the application root; however, if you want to change the name or location of the file from which the loads data, you can override the default configuration in your Web.config file. 藉由覆寫 Web.config 檔案中的預設組態設定，您可以調整對流程投入的行為每個 ASP.NET 應用程式，視。By overriding the default configuration settings in your Web.config file, you can tailor the behavior of the for each ASP.NET application, as necessary. 下列程式碼範例示範範例 Web.config 檔案中，其中仍然使用，但不同站台對應檔案使用。The following code example demonstrates an example Web.config file, where the is still used, but a different site map file is used. 因為所有的提供者中物件必須具有唯一名稱、 Web.config 檔案中指定了一個使用預設值以外的名稱，但也會設為預設提供者，使其將會用而不是也就是指定在第e 預設 ASP.NET 組態。Because all providers in a object must be named uniquely, the one that is specified in the Web.config file uses a name other than the default but is also set as the default provider so that it will be used instead of the that is specified in the default ASP.NET configuration. > [!NOTE] > 您可以變更站台瀏覽資料檔案名稱，但您無法變更其副檔名。You can change the name of the site navigation data file, but you cannot change its extension. 只會從所命名的檔案名稱副檔名.sitemap 檔案的讀取資料。The only reads data from files that are named with the file name extension .sitemap. ``` ```

summary.span: 將 物件新增至目前提供者所維護的集合中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `node`參數會加入至內部集合，而且它之間建立父子式關聯性和`parentNode`。The `node` parameter is added to an internal collection, and a parent/child relationship is created between it and `parentNode`. 類別、 衍生自類別和 ASP.NET 中，使用的預設站台對應提供者屬性物件做為查閱索引鍵中，依預設其內部集合。The class, derived from the class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果屬性已經設定，它必須是唯一的提供者的範圍內。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider. 方法嘗試擷取節點根據其。The method attempts to retrieve nodes based on their . 否則，您可以使用屬性，並對應方法，以擷取節點。Otherwise, you can use the property, and the corresponding method, to retrieve nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法連結`providerName`到目前的提供者目前的提供者的子系。The method links `providerName` to the current provider as a child of the current provider. 根節點`providerName`的子節點加入至目前的提供者的階層`parentNode`。The root node of `providerName` is added to the hierarchy for the current provider as a child node of `parentNode`. 因為父提供者會呼叫方法`providerName`，如下所述的例外狀況方法可能會擲回。Because the parent provider calls the method on `providerName`, the exceptions that are described in the method might be thrown.

summary.span: 移除子系和父代網站地圖節點及網站地圖提供者集合中的所有項目； 物件會在內部追蹤其狀態時一併追蹤這些集合。

span.span: Removes all elements in the collections of child and parent site map nodes and site map providers that the object internally tracks as part of its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會覆寫繼承方法以提供基本以外的其他狀態清除實作，包括清除追蹤其子提供者和屬性追蹤機制。The class overrides the inherited method to provide additional state cleanup beyond the basic implementation, including clearing its child provider tracking and the property tracking mechanisms.

span.span: Notifies the file monitor of the Web.sitemap file that the object no longer requires the file to be monitored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作方法從記憶體卸載的站台對應檔案時，釋放其相關聯的檔案監視的介面。The class implements the method of the interface to release its associated file monitor when the site map file is unloaded from memory. 這個多載方法呼叫的多載，參數並將值設定為`true`。This overload of the method calls the overload that takes a parameter and sets the value to `true`.

summary.span: 方法會使用布林參數，指出方法是否由使用者程式碼呼叫。

span.span: The method takes a Boolean parameter indicating whether the method is called by user code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`true`如果方法由使用者程式碼呼叫。The method returns `true` if the method is called by user code. 否則它會傳回`false`，如果方法，會在執行階段呼叫完成項執行緒。Otherwise it returns `false`, if the method is called by the finalizer thread during run time.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.SiteMapNode FindSiteMapNode (string rawUrl);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNode FindSiteMapNode(string rawUrl) cil managed
Public Overrides Function FindSiteMapNode (rawUrl As String) As SiteMapNode
public: override System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ FindSiteMapNode(System::String ^ rawUrl);

param.name: rawUrl
param.span: URL，其可識別要擷取 的頁面。

span.span: A URL that identifies the page for which to retrieve a .

summary.span: 擷取 物件，其代表位於指定 URL 的頁面。

span.span: Retrieves a object that represents the page at the specified URL.
A that represents the page identified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會覆寫方法，以確保如果基底類別的實作不會傳回指定之 url 的節點，連結的子系的任何提供者會搜尋節點。The object overrides the method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node if the implementation of the base class does not return a node for the specified URL. `rawUrl`參數應該是絕對虛擬路徑或應用程式的相對路徑，根據其 XML 站台對應資料檔案中的指定方式。The `rawUrl` parameter should be either an absolute virtual path or an application-relative path, depending on how it is specified in the XML site map data file. 類別和衍生自它的類別使用的 URL做為索引鍵中的類別會維護的各種集合物件。The class and classes that are derived from it use the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the class maintains. 因此，這些 Url 必須是唯一的站台對應範圍內。Therefore, these URLs must be unique within the scope of the site map. 如果立即網站導覽資料管理的內找不到 URL ，它會呼叫連結至其每一個子系提供者上`provider`其站台對應節點的屬性。If the URL is not found within the immediate site map data that is managed by the , it calls the on each child provider that is linked to it through the `provider` attribute of its site map nodes. 方法間接呼叫方法來擷取站台對應中的最上層節點。The method indirectly calls the method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map. 因此，會發生任何例外狀況方法呼叫時也會發生方法。Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the method can also occur when calling the method.

exception.span: 連結至目前網站地圖提供者的子提供者傳回無效的節點。

span.span: A child provider linked to the current site map provider returned a node that is not valid.

span.span: A that represents the page identified by ; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be shown to the current user or the node is not found by in the node collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別覆寫方法，以確保如果基底類別的實作不會傳回的節點連結的子系的任何提供者會搜尋節點，而`key`。The class overrides the method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node, if the implementation for the base class does not return a node for `key`. 物件，衍生自類別和 ASP.NET 中，使用的預設站台對應提供者屬性物件做為查閱索引鍵中，依預設其內部集合。The object, derived from the class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果屬性已經設定，它必須是唯一的提供者的範圍內。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider. 如果沒有指定，則會自動產生追蹤節點。If no is specified, the automatically generates a to track the nodes. 方法可能會呼叫上目前的提供者相關聯的任何子系提供者方法。The method might call the method on any child providers that are associated with the current provider. 因此，如下所述的例外狀況方法可能會擲回。Therefore, the exceptions that are described in the method might be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除`providerName`從目前的提供者階層，包括所建立的任何父/子關聯性目前的提供者的站台對應節點和移除提供者之間的方法。The method removes `providerName` from the hierarchy for the current provider, including any parent/child relationships that are established by the method between site map nodes of the current provider and the removed provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.SiteMapNode RootNode { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.SiteMapNode RootNode
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property RootNode As SiteMapNode
public: virtual property System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ RootNode { System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得網站地圖的根節點。

span.span: Gets the root node of the site map.

value.span: 表示網站導覽之根節點的 ；如果安全性調整已啟用而且目前的使用者無法存取根節點，則為 。

span.span: A that represents the root node of the site map; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the root node is not accessible to the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性呼叫方法來擷取站台對應中的最上層節點。The property calls the method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map. 因此，會發生任何例外狀況方法也會發生存取時屬性。Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the method can also occur when accessing the property. 和類別允許只能有一個根網站導覽中的物件。The and classes permit only one root object in a site map. 類別會覆寫的抽象屬性，並提供追蹤的根節點的簡單實作。The class overrides the abstract property and provides a simple implementation to track the root node.
